amendment.description: To protect the jobs of American workers.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2680 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2680 proposed by Senator McConnell to Amendment SA 2660. (consideration: CR S2192-2206) To protect the jobs of American workers.
